actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Skagit River in Washington as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified segment of the Skagit River, Washington, as a wild river. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to consult with affected Federal and State authorities, as well as the interested public, in the development of a management plan for the area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Skagit River in Washington as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
